Learning Outcomes: LO1: Assess cloud solutions and specifications for Azure cloud computing.
LO2: Develop an implementation plan for implementing Azure cloud computing
LO3: Develop review processes to resolve Azure cloud computing implementation issues.

analyst_responses.What are the performance gaps in the ind: A common problem is the lack of effective monitoring and governance of cloud deployments. Without proper oversight, costs can quickly spiral out of control, and compliance with regulations becomes difficult. Furthermore, resolving implementation issues requires specialized skills that are often in short supply, hindering the ability to maintain optimal performance.
analyst_responses.Why do you think this WSQ course will ad: This course emphasizes the development of review processes for cloud implementation. Participants will learn how to monitor key metrics, utilize governance tools, and troubleshoot issues effectively. This comprehensive approach enables organizations to maintain control over their cloud environments, ensuring cost-effectiveness, compliance, and reliable performance.
